text: Jacques de Morgan (1857-1924) was a French civil engineer, geologist and archaeologist. He was the head of Antiquities in Egypt in the 19th century. He excavated in Memphis and Dashur, providing many drawings of many Egyptian pyramids. ==Related pages== *Ancient Armenia == Other websites == *Jacques de Morgan at Iranica *Jacques de Morgan - ArmeniaPedia.org *Jacques de Morgan; An Archaeologist Who Found Oil Category:1857 births Category:1924 deaths Category:French archaeologists Category:French geologists
title: Jacques de Morgan
